name: Squirrel Away (Surprise Mechanics)
description:
"Squirrel Away" is a multiplayer collect-a-thon where you compete with up to 6 other players, controlling squirrels who must gather, bury, and steal as many acorns as they can before winter comes

Must have a minimum of 2 players to play

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • Shift to Dash Attack
  • Hold Z to Bury / Dig Up Acorns
  • X to Eat Acorns

Made for Summer Slow Jams June 2020: Exploration Games

Theme: Forgotten Places
